name: oodi socks
notes:
these socks are part of a capsule wardrobe designed by sari nordlund, comprising nine designs perfectly compatible with each other. the capsule wardrobe concept was introduced in britain in the 1970’s, and has recently regained popularity as fashion consumption slowly shifts in a more sustainable direction.

each garment is named after a finnish female writer, except for these socks. they're called oodi after the helsinki central library that opened in 2019. an architectural gem well worth a visit!

size
one size, adult

yarn demand
novita venla
(010) off white 100 g

needles and other supplies
double-pointed needles novita 2½ mm (uk 12½ / us 1½) or size needed for gauge;
cable needle

designer
sari nordlund

finished dimensions
shoe size 38/39 (eur)

gauge
32 sts and 38 rows in stockinette st = 10 cm / 4 in

pattern is here in finnish https://novita.com/patterns/oodi-villasukat

here in swedish https://novita.com/sv/patterns/oodi-raggsockor

and here in english https://novita.com/en/patterns/oodi-socks-novita-venla
